summary: THE HEATER/AC BLEND DOOR IS BROKEN: THE DRIVER'S SIDE GETS AC BUT THE PASSENGER SIDE ONLY RECEIVE HOT AIR.  THIS IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM WITH THIS MODEL JEEP. THE DEALER REFUSES TO REPAIR THE PROBLEM UNDER WARRANTY. THE VEHICLE IS 2 MONTHS OUT OF WARRANTY AND HAS 30,120 MILES.  JEEPS DENIES THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM, AND YET THE INTERNET IS FILLED WITH JEEP BLEND DOOR COMPLAINTS.  *TR
